info.title: propFinder
info.description: propFinder is a real-estate web application that demonstrates the sustainability in municipalities of metropolitan area of Athens, based on open data.

license.name: This data is made available under the Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL).

get.description: Returns the Municipalities of Athens with their unique path_id or the kind of schools.

post.description: Returns the indexes results the employee had chosen in conjunction with the final sustainability results.

get.description: Returns all the real estate data from the database. Data derived from Ministry of Finance in conjunction with the information from the Bank of Greece.
Returns all the Bank of Greece's apartment index data from the database. Data derived from Bank of Greece.
Returns all the Population data of municipalities from the database either per year or per municipality. Data derived from census reports of Hellenic Statistic Authority.
Returns Criminality Data depending the query attributes (5 cases) for the Region of Attica. Data derived from the Ministry of Civil Protection.

post.description: Returns all the School Data (with Pagination) from the metropolitan region of Athens. Open Data derived from Open Data catalogue of Greece 'repository.data.gov.gr'.

kind.description: The type of the education institution.

values.name: ΓΕΛ ΚΩΦΩΝ & ΒΑΡΗΚΟΩΝ ΑΓΙΑΣ ΠΑΡΑΣΚΕΥΗΣ
values.type: Γυμνάσιο Ειδικής Αγωγής με Λυκειακές Τάξεις

post.description: Returns all the Transportation Data (with Pagination) for the metropolitan area of Athens. Data derived from 'O2Hub Open data platform' and from 'ChoiceGreece' (for subway stations).
Returns the Secondary Data (with Pagination). Open data from 'Region of Attica site' & 'Open Data portal of Region of Attica'.

enum: Κέντρα Δημιουργικής Απασχόλησης Παίδων με Αναπηρία

values.address: Ν. ΠΛΑΣΤΗΡΑ ΚΑΙ ΚΛΕΙΣΟΥΡΑΣ 2, ΑΓ. ΑΝΑΡΓΥΡΟΙ

values.building: ΑΙΘΟΥΣΑ ΠΡΟΣΩΠΙΚΟΥ ΤΗΣ ΔΝΣΗΣ ΔΙΑΧΕΙΡΙΣΗΣ ΑΠΟΡΡΙΜΑΤΩΝ ΚΑΙ ΠΡΑΣΙΝΟΥ

post.description: Open Data for Air Pollution Data from the Ministry of Environment of Greece. There are data for only 6 municipalities of the metropolitan region of Athens.
